A love that never was

How can you love someone so much..tell them you love them..hug them..talk to them..they tell you I love you..and the whole time they don't mean a word of it..seems like you put in yourself 100 percent and them put in about 1 percent and all the rest bullshit..I guess thats just life..sucks..
